name: test_minting_unicode_asset_name
description:
Test minting and burning of token with unicode non-ascii chars in its asset name.

        Tests https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-node/issues/2337

        * mint a token that has non-ascii characters in its asset name
        * burn the minted token
        * check fees in Lovelace
        * (optional) check transactions in db-sync
descriptionHtml:
Test minting and burning of token with unicode non-ascii chars in its asset name.

    Tests https://github.com/input-output-hk/cardano-node/issues/2337

    * mint a token that has non-ascii characters in its asset name
    * burn the minted token
    * check fees in Lovelace
    * (optional) check transactions in db-sync

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='native tokens are available only in Mary+ eras')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='native tokens are available only in Mary+ eras')
